refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays boot-time emergency log message in full screen

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: systemd-bsod.service is used to display a blue screen which contains a message relating to a boot failure, including a QR code which can be scanned to get helpful information about the failure.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The following options are understood by systemd-bsod:

listitem.para: When specified, systemd-bsod waits continuously for changes in the journal if it doesn't find any emergency messages on the initial attempt.

refsect1.title: Exit status
refsect1.para: On success (displaying the journal message successfully), 0 is returned, a non-zero failure code otherwise.
